info.comment:
-=Inspriation=-
I've always wanted to make something like this ever since I saw the scratch game "Neo" a few years ago. It was only when I saw a flash game a few days, did I become inspired to finally make my own.

-=Update!=-
Fixed a level glitch...

-=About=-
Paper Warfare is a shoot 'em up, where you control a small ship. Blast as many enemies you can before you complete all 3 levels, or run out of lives. The game also features a data screen, which stores tones of stats.

-=Instructions=-
Using W,A,S,D for movement, and the space key to shoot, blast enemies as you fly through 3 levels. Each level goes for 1 minute, and has its own location. At the end of each level, your lives are restored to 3, but if you already have all 3 you are given 1000 bonus points. Also, each time you complete a level you earn a bonus 100 points.

-=====================-
Remember to post your high scores in a comment! 
-=====================-
